text: River of the Temple, Division of the Land and Its Boundaries

And he brought me back to the doorway of the temple and, look! There was water coming out from under the threshold of the temple eastward, because the face of the temple \add was\add* eastwards; and the water was coming down from under the south side of the temple, from south of the altar.
